QuestData.Title: And Stay Dead!
QuestData.Description: Tombcaller Arban has holed up in the largest kurgan, where the first Maruuk ancestors were laid to rest. Stop Arban before he raises Maruuk and Teera!
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the main kurgan and defeat Tombcaller Arban.
QuestData.RewardText: Unlike my mother, and our ancestors, no one will wish for Arban to live again. Thank you for helping me avenge them.
